items.content_html: EBL (esbuild-bundle-lite) is an esbuild-based bundling tool designed for React projects. It provides a lightweight and efficient build process, leveraging the speed of esbuild and the flexibility of custom plugins.

items.content_html: Lightweight and efficient map visualization package that helps you manage and render large sets of markers on a 100x100 grid. By categorizing and organizing markers into a grid, this package significantly improves map performance, especially when panning or zooming.
items.title: Dovday/markers-spatial-hash: Lightweight and efficient map visualization package that helps you manage and render large sets of markers on a 100x100 grid. By categorizing and organizing markers into a grid, this package significantly improves map performance, especially when panning or zooming.
